features: Best protection: Professional surge protector, specially designed to protect your microwave against high and low voltage, brownout, spike, instant surge, power failure, voltage fluctuation and load shedding
Usage: SUGGESTED FOR ALL TYPES OF MICROWAVES (up to 70 liters, 2.5 cubic feet or 1500 watts). This surge protector will prevent damage, ensuring that your microwave is safe from power spikes.

Delay period: The delay period indicator turns on when the MICROMATIC is first plugged to the power outlet or after a power outage. It takes 30 SECONDS delay time to allow stabilization of the system. PLEASE WAIT 3 MINUTES the first time you use this unit for your microwave to start working
Light indicators: Light indicators for Normal, High, Low voltage and Time Delay
body.description: The Best Protection for Your Electronics When the energy returns, voltage peaks occur. They are excesses of energy, which can sometimes rise to several hundred or, exceptionally, thousands of volts during fractions of a second. That, for an appliance that is used to receiving 120 volts, is terrible! MICROMATIC is an electronic device designed to prevent the damage caused by blackouts, surges and voltage drops. It is the most professional and reliable protector against high and low voltage for your microwave oven.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why do Surge Protectors matter? A good quality appliance surge protector is a must-have item in all homes, but most people don’t realize its importance until something blows up. If the appliance was turned on and receives the impact, it simply burns. And that is the least serious. A fire may be the other option. A power surge can create an arc of electrical current within an appliance. The heat generated during this process can permanently damage circuit boards and other components. If one surge doesn't ruin your possessions, multiple smaller surges may. Continued power surges can erode internal parts and shorten the useful life of an appliance. IF YOUR MICROWAVE OVEN SUFFERS YOUR WALLET TOO! Surges and spikes can damage home equipment beyond practical repair, either instantaneously or over time. Even a little voltage change can eventually destroy or affect the performance of your microwave oven.

How Micromatic works? This protection is achieved by constantly measuring the voltage on the power line, disconnecting the load as soon as the rise or decrease in value occurs, outside the allowed range. If the load is disconnected due to a disturbance in the power supply, the MICROMATIC will only reconnect it after the connection time, after the voltage value returns to the proper working range. How to install? Micromatic has a polarized socket on the side for the connection of the equipment to be protected and an extra strong side plug for equipment connection. · Inspect the plug and socket. · Plug the appliance to the Micromatic unit and this to power outlet. · Your appliance will start after 3 minutes. Features · Protection against Over voltage and Under voltage. · Protection against blackouts. · Internal timer for 30 seconds connection. · Lights Indicators for OVER VOLTAGE, LOW VOLTAGE, WAITING CYCLE,NORMAL VOLTAGE. · Housing made of engineering plastic material.

The Best Protection for Your Electronics When the energy returns, voltage peaks occur. They are excesses of energy, which can sometimes rise to several hundred or, exceptionally, thousands of volts during fractions of a second. That, for an appliance that is used to receiving 120 volts, is terrible! MICROMATIC is an electronic device designed to prevent the damage caused by blackouts, surges and voltage drops. It is the most professional and reliable protector against high and low voltage for your microwave oven. READY TO USE: Just plug your microwave oven SMALL AND CONVENIENT DESIGN: Small size, light weight and portable LIGHT INDICATORS: Light indicators for normal, high, low voltage and time delay

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great microwave surge protector
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Should be Great for power failures/brownouts
reviews.reviewText: Received this afternoon to use on a new microwave oven. Due to power fail/restore and brown-outs, my old microwave oven only gave the faintest audible alerts when heating was complete. All other functions were good but I’d like to have an audible alert when cooking was complete. I have, for years, a surge protector/line conditioner that constantly displays the ac voltage from the power company I use for my audio/video equipment. Watching the voltage when power restores after failing or when there’s a brown-out is an eye opener. The voltage can drop to near 100 and rise to 130. At one particular time the power company had severe problems. The voltage fluctuated from below 80v to over 150v. Many people lost fridges, air conditioners, tv’s, etc. After reading that this unit actually doesn’t send power to the microwave for about 30 seconds after commercial power restores, I had to buy it. I have simulated a power failure to see if it really works. It did! About 30 seconds after power restored to the outlet the microwave powered on.Considering how this protector operates, I think it’s a good value.Note: When commercial power restores the voltage usually takes several seconds to settle down. This can be the hardest on equipment.Also note, regarding other comments regarding the instructions, the single page with the device is equal in both English and Spanish. They both say the same thing. This device is about the simplest thing to use. Per the label on the device itself, plug the equipment into it (the microwave) THEN plug this protector into the ac outlet. The led’s on the front tell you the status. You should see a yellow light indicating Delay Period. After about 30 seconds the unit will click and the green Normal Voltage led will light. Thats when the microwave will power up.

reviews.reviewText: Perfecto para proteger los artículos electrodomésticos de los problemas de voltaje de Yucatan.
Excelente producto, cumple a la perfección su función. Recomendado
Lo usé para proteger mi horno de microondas contra cualquier alteración en la energía eléctrica,,,,

Llevo apenas un par de semanas con el y he tenido ya una variación de voltaje en la que demuestra que funciona muy bien, Para todos aquellos que dicen que no cambia el led de color y no pueden usarlo deben estar consciente que deben dejarlo conectado por máximo 3 minutos hasta que los capacitores estén llenos o de caso contrario revisar bien el voltaje y amperaje de su hogar
Hasta el momento ha funcionado perfectamente para proteger mi microondas
